data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample PEYTO-41

Exposition S, Slope 1 deg, Geology: Kalkreicher Hangschutt, Tree line 2150 m, av. Tree height 22 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 70%, Herb cover 10%, Moss cover 5%, Vegatation type: Urw. an der Basis eines Hanges. Mehrst. wü. , Film number: 724A
